TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IComponentConnector

summary.span: 對具名 XAML 項目提供標記編譯及工具支援，以便將事件處理常式附加至這些項目。

span.span: Provides markup compile and tools support for named XAML elements and for attaching event handlers to them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面會在內部使用。This interface is used internally by . 實作架構所提供的基礎結構的一部分是廣泛的可預見值，或使用 XAML 的技術結合的應用程式和程式設計模型。Implementations of are widely observable as part of the infrastructure provided by frameworks or technologies that use XAML combined with application and programming models. 例如，每當您查看產生的類別，WPF 網頁和應用程式中的 XAML 根項目時，您會看到輸出中所定義。For example, whenever you look at the generated classes for XAML root elements in WPF pages and applications, you will see defined in the output. 該方法也會存在於編譯的組件，並在 XAML 剖析階段載入 XAML UI 內容的 WPF 應用程式模型中扮演的角色。That method also exists in the compiled assembly and plays a role in the WPF application model of loading the XAML UI content at XAML parse time. 如需有關 WPF 整合`InitializeComponent`概念，請參閱 < [ 應用程式管理概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md)或是[程式碼後置和 XAML 在 WPF 中的](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md)。For more information on the WPF integration of the `InitializeComponent` concept, see [Application Management Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md) or [Code-Behind and XAML in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md). 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，此介面會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 特定組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]， System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 。. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). > [!TIP] > 若要解決失敗嘗試建置期間，這通常您不具有正確更新您的 WPF 專案。A failure to resolve during an attempted build is often an indicator that you have not updated your WPF project correctly. 專案未參考 System.Xaml 組件為目標的專案，特別是， [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。In particular, the project is not referencing the System.Xaml assembly for a project that targets [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 請嘗試執行`devenv /upgrade`專案的選項，或進行調整專案的組件參考，使 System.Xaml 的參考清單中。Try running the `devenv /upgrade` option for the project, or otherwise adjust the project assembly references so that System.Xaml is in the reference list.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Connect (int connectionId, object target);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Connect(int32 connectionId, object target) cil managed
Public Sub Connect (connectionId As Integer, target As Object)
public: void Connect(int connectionId, System::Object ^ target);
abstract member Connect : int * obj -> unit

param.name: connectionId
param.span: 要區分呼叫的識別項語彙基元。

span.span: An identifier token to distinguish calls.

param.name: target
param.span: 要連接事件和名稱的目標。

span.span: The target to connect events and names to.

summary.span: 附加事件和名稱至編譯內容。

span.span: Attaches events and names to compiled content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會在內部使用。 is used internally by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeComponent() cil managed

summary.span: 載入元件之編譯過的頁面。

span.span: Loads the compiled page of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會在內部使用。 is used internally by . 實作架構所提供的基礎結構的一部分是廣泛的可預見值，或使用 XAML 的技術結合的應用程式和程式設計模型。Implementations of are widely observable as part of the infrastructure provided by frameworks or technologies that use XAML combined with application and programming models. 例如，每當您查看產生的類別，WPF 網頁和應用程式中的 XAML 根項目時，您會看到輸出中所定義。For example, whenever you look at the generated classes for XAML root elements in WPF pages and applications, you will see defined in the output. 該方法也會存在於編譯的組件，並在 XAML 剖析階段載入 XAML UI 內容的 WPF 應用程式模型中扮演的角色。That method also exists in the compiled assembly and plays a role in the WPF application model of loading the XAML UI content at XAML parse time. 如需有關 WPF 整合`InitializeComponent`概念，請參閱 < [ 應用程式管理概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md)或是[程式碼後置和 XAML 在 WPF 中的](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md)。For more information on the WPF integration of the `InitializeComponent` concept, see [Application Management Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/application-management-overview.md) or [Code-Behind and XAML in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/code-behind-and-xaml-in-wpf.md).
